name: Parth Maheshwari

experience.title: Partnerships
experience.description: Hyperface is revolutionizing the way entities issue and consumers use credit cards. We work with banks to help them scale their credit card portfolio in a compliant and seamless manner and at the time provide a fantastic experience to the end consumer. I take care of bank and brand partnerships.

experience.title: Investment Professional
experience.description: Samyakth Capital is a fintech fund investing in pre seed and seed stage deals. Its portfolio companies include BharatPe, Dukaan, LiquiLoans, RentoMojo, Dukaan, etc. Responsibilities included sourcing and evaluating deals and portfolio management.

recommendations: Yashaswi Gupta “Parth and I worked together at Ruby Capital, where he assisted me with evaluating fundraising deals for early-stage startups. I found him to be a keen observer with sharp technical knowledge. He displayed high level of ownership and professionalism at work. I wish him luck and hope to see him nurture into a successful professional in the years to come.”

Gaurav Phadke “Parth demonstrated an insatiable hunger to learn from day one of his internship. He also made it a point to periodically seek feedback and implement the suggestions. Most importantly, he showed the ability and willingness to exceed the brief given to him to create deliverables that exceeded expectations.”
